IntegerParameter.Name: sw_flag
IntegerParameter.Description: This parameter controls the version of current AGC: 0 is v1.0

FixedPointParameter.Name: maximum_level
FixedPointParameter.Description: The (absolute) level to which the signal peak is scaled by AGC specified in dB this is a value very close to, and less than 0. Default value: -164

FixedPointParameter.Name: gain_attack_rate
FixedPointParameter.Description: Rate in dB per millisecs at which gain can increase inside the module (Range 0.001 to 10). Default=16

FixedPointParameter.Name: gain_decay_rate
FixedPointParameter.Description: Rate in dB per millisecs at which gain can decrease inside the module (Range 0.001 to 10). Default=163840

FixedPointParameter.Name: silence_threshold
FixedPointParameter.Description: The level below which the input is assumed to be background noise.(Range -96 to -20). Default=-1572864

FixedPointParameter.Name: stream_gap_threshold
FixedPointParameter.Description: Silence duration in seconds beyond which a new stream is assumed to have started.(Range 0.3 to 10). Default=9830

FixedPointParameter.Name: gain_limit
FixedPointParameter.Description: The maximum permitted gain in dB.(Range 5 to 60). Default=573440

FixedPointParameter.Name: gain_hold_time
FixedPointParameter.Description: Time in seconds following a gain setting over which it is not allowed to rise (Hysteresis time). (Range 0.001 to 2). Default=65536

FixedPointParameter.Name: gain_initial
FixedPointParameter.Description: Initial gain setting in absolute terms.(Range 6 to 8). Default=98304

FixedPointParameter.Name: spurious_peak_threshold
FixedPointParameter.Description: Peak to mse ratio for detecting spurious peaks in the audio signal. Default=4
